statements: SELECT * FROM RobotLocationHistory WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT location FROM RobotLocationHistory WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM RobotLocationHistory WHERE location = 'Factory A' ORDER BY usage_start_time DESC;
SELECT robot_id, location FROM RobotLocationHistory WHERE usage_end_time > '2022-01-01' AND usage_end_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM RobotLocationHistory;
SELECT * FROM RobotLocationHistory WHERE robot_id = 1
SELECT location, usage_start_time FROM RobotLocationHistory WHERE usage_end_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT robot_id, usage_end_time FROM RobotLocationHistory WHERE location LIKE '%warehouse%' ORDER BY usage_end_time DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM RobotLocationHistory WHERE robot_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM RobotLocationHistory WHERE usage_end_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT id, robot_name, location FROM robots WHERE location='Factory';
SELECT warehouse_name, location, temperature FROM warehouse WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT id, robot_name, usage_history FROM robots WHERE id=3;
SELECT id, robot_name, location, usage_history FROM robots WHERE location IS NULL
SELECT warehouse_name, location, temperature FROM warehouse WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC
SELECT * FROM robots r JOIN warehouse w ON r.location = w.location WHERE r.id = 1
SELECT r.robot_name, w.warehouse_name, w.location FROM robots r, warehouse w WHERE r.location = 'Factory A' AND w.temperature < 0
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM warehouse
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_name, location FROM robots WHERE in_use = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM robot_usage_history ORDER BY usage_timestamp DESC;
SELECT robot_name, location FROM robots WHERE robot_name LIKE 'R2D2%';
SELECT location_id, location_name, location_description FROM warehouse_locations;
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE in_use = TRUE ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT robot_name, location FROM robots WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT * FROM robot_usage_history WHERE usage_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT robot_name, location, usage_timestamp FROM robots INNER JOIN robot_usage_history ON robots.id = robot_usage_history.robot_id;
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM warehouse_locations WHERE location_description LIKE '%storage%';
SELECT * FROM Robots;
SELECT robot_name, location_id FROM Robots WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT robot_name, location_id, last_maintenance_date FROM Robots WHERE robot_id <> 1;
SELECT robot_name, location_id, last_maintenance_date FROM Robots WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT robot_name, location_id FROM Robots WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Robots;
SELECT robot_name, location_id FROM Robots WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT robot_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Robots ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT r.robot_name, l.location_name, u.start_time, u.end_time FROM Robots r JOIN UsageHistory u ON r.robot_id = u.robot_id JOIN Locations l ON l.location_id = r.location_id;
SELECT r.robot_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_type FROM Robots r JOIN MaintenanceLogs m ON r.robot_id = m.robot_id WHERE m.maintenance_type = 'Regular Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name ASC;
SELECT robot_name, current_location FROM robots WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT robot_name, current_location, last_maintenance_date FROM robots WHERE current_location LIKE '%warehouse%';
SELECT rh.event_type, rh.event_time, r.robot_name FROM robot_history rh JOIN robots r ON rh.robot_id = r.robot_id;
SELECT th.technician_name, th.specialization, ml.maintenance_date FROM technicians th JOIN maintenance_logs ml ON th.technician_name = ml.technician_name ORDER BY ml.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE robot_name = 'R2D2';
SELECT robot_name, current_location FROM robots WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT rh.event_time, rh.event_type, r.robot_name FROM robot_history rh JOIN robots r ON rh.robot_id = r.robot_id WHERE rh.location = 'Dock A';
SELECT rl.location_name, rl.x_coordinate, rl.y_coordinate FROM warehouse_locations rl ORDER BY rl.x_coordinate DESC, rl.y_coordinate ASC;

SELECT t.technician_name, t.specialization, COUNT(ml.log_id) AS total_maintenance_logs FROM technicians t LEFT JOIN maintenance_logs ml ON t.technician_name = ml.technician_name GROUP BY t.technician_name, t.specialization ORDER BY total_maintenance_logs DESC;
